name: Mr. Red LightYear
description:
Controls: - A & D = horizontal movement

                      - Space = jump

                      - Shift = sprint

In this fun little plat former your goal is to collect 4 coins within 15 seconds.

There are 5 level you can explore and play, more are to come!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Update 1.1 : - A new screen that shows up when you complete the game!
